children.text: This template is for an hourly proposal using interior design as an example. It includes an hourly rate for time and fixed costs for furniture. Duplicate and adjust for your circumstances or industry.
We're excited to share our proposal for your home. You can interact with this proposal to better understand the process and play with cost scenarios.
for room design, development and project management. In this proposal all costs are broken down by stage with estimated hours. We also provide a breakdown of estimated furniture costs.
Here is a summary of your estimated costs:
Before we begin design work, we will require a retainer. The retainer will be
which we will send an invoice for once you approve the proposal.  We also be sending an invoice for the opening meeting of
. For your project we are estimating a total time of
which comes to a fee of
. Below we have broken down the project hours by room and for project development.
includes all meetings, product sourcing, floor plans, moodboards, showroom visits, installations of product in home.
Below is a breakdown of estimated hours per room for mood board and furniture sourcing. You can select/unselect room to see an adjusted total.
Additional hours include our time for planning, management, installation and styling. We've broken down each part of the journey with estimated hours. We estimate
A touch point meeting to review color palettes, styles, and textiles before the design is further developed.
Includes time for revisions (as needed) and development of your plan with item/cost summary.
Place orders for all items and communicate with vendors and coordinate deliveries etc. Optional to be onsite to project manage, not included in this proposal.
We spend time in your home helping you style and organize to tie everything together!
Summary of hours for project development:
Total cost for time and project development:
Below is an estimate of furniture costs for each room. You can expand the folders to see the breakdown.
You can edit the below information and add/remove pieces to update your cost estimate.
